children.text: The "Sea, Land, and Sky" English Camp in Singapore is a 7-day immersive program designed for students aged 10 to 15. Combining official IELTS preparation courses with unique cultural experiences, this camp offers a perfect blend of learning and adventure. Students will explore Singapore's iconic landmarks, engage in hands-on activities, and enjoy luxurious experiences while improving their English skills. With small class sizes and expert guidance, this program ensures a safe, enriching, and unforgettable journey for young learners.
新加坡"海陆空"英语营是一个为期7天的沉浸式项目，专为10至15岁的学生设计。该项目将官方雅思备考课程与独特的文化体验相结合，为学生提供学习与冒险的完美结合。学生们将探索新加坡的标志性景点，参与实践活动，并在提升英语能力的同时享受奢华体验。通过小班教学和专家指导，该项目确保为年轻学习者提供一个安全、充实且难忘的旅程。

The "Sea, Land, and Sky" English Camp in Singapore is a 7-day immersive program designed for students aged 10 to 15. Combining official IELTS preparation courses with unique cultural experiences, this camp offers a perfect blend of learning and adventure. Students will explore Singapore's iconic landmarks, engage in hands-on activities, and enjoy luxurious experiences while improving their English skills. With small class sizes and expert guidance, this program ensures a safe, enriching, and unforgettable journey for young learners.
新加坡"海陆空"英语营是一个为期7天的沉浸式项目，专为10至15岁的学生设计。该项目将官方雅思备考课程与独特的文化体验相结合，为学生提供学习与冒险的完美结合。学生们将探索新加坡的标志性景点，参与实践活动，并在提升英语能力的同时享受奢华体验。通过小班教学和专家指导，该项目确保为年轻学习者提供一个安全、充实且难忘的旅程。
Official IELTS courses tailored for young learners, focusing on vocabulary, listening, and speaking skills
Explore Singapore through the 'Sea, Land, Air' theme, including visits to Marina Barrage, Gardens by the Bay, and the Singapore Flyer
Experience Singapore's multicultural heritage through visits to Chinatown, Little India, and Kampong Glam
Enjoy gourmet dining, stay in a centrally located hotel, and visit world-class attractions like Universal Studios
Maximum of 15 students per class, ensuring personalized attention and a supportive learning environment
- 雅思备考：专为年轻学习者设计的官方雅思课程，重点提升词汇、听力和口语能力
- 独特主题：通过"海陆空"主题探索新加坡，包括参观滨海堤坝、滨海湾花园和新加坡摩天观景轮
- 文化沉浸：通过参观牛车水、小印度和甘榜格南，体验新加坡的多元文化遗产
- 奢华体验：享受美食，入住市中心酒店，并参观环球影城等世界级景点
- 小班教学：每班最多15名学生，确保个性化关注和支持性学习环境
Evening	Hainanese Chicken Rice Dinner & Ice-breaking Activities
Afternoon	NEWater, Marina Barrage, Duck Tour
Afternoon	Merlion, Kampong Glam, Chinatown, Little India
Afternoon	Marina Bay Sands SkyPark, Singapore Flyer
Day 5	Morning	National University of Singapore Tour
Afternoon	Nanyang Technological University, Botanic Gardens
Day 7	Morning	Jewel Changi Airport (Rain Vortex)

Stay at Hotel Royal Singapore, a 4-star hotel near Newton Food Centre and Orchard Road - Cuisine: Enjoy local and international dishes including Hainanese chicken rice, laksa, and Nyonya specialties

Combine classroom learning with cultural tours and team-building activities - Safety: 24/7 supervision by experienced staff ensures a secure environment - Cultural Tours: Expert-led visits to iconic landmarks for deep cultural insights - Global Network: Build friendships with peers from diverse backgrounds

Ranked first globally in order and security (World Justice Project, 2020) - Environment: Known as the 'Garden City' with lush greenery and well-maintained parks - Infrastructure: Excellent public facilities and strong environmental awareness - Accessibility: 5-hour direct flight from Beijing with no time difference
- 酒店：入住新加坡皇家酒店，四星级酒店，毗邻纽顿美食中心和乌节路
- 美食：享用本地和国际美食，包括海南鸡饭、叻沙和娘惹菜
- 教育：结合课堂学习、文化游览和团队建设活动
- 安全：经验丰富的员工提供24/7全天候监督
- 文化：专家带领探索标志性景点，深入了解历史文化
- 交流：与来自不同背景的同龄人建立友谊
- 治安：2020年世界正义工程评估中秩序与安全排名全球第一
- 环境："花园城市"以郁郁葱葱的绿化和完善的公园著称
- 设施：出色的公共基础设施和高度的环保意识
- 便利：距离北京5小时直飞，无时差
Guided visits to iconic sites for deep cultural insights - Global Network: Form friendships with peers from diverse backgrounds

Ranked first in global safety (World Justice Project, 2020) - City Planning: Known as the 'Garden City' with excellent green spaces - Infrastructure: High environmental awareness and quality public facilities
5-hour direct flight from Beijing - Time Zone: No time difference with China - Transportation: Efficient public transport system
- 专业导览：由专家带领探索标志性景点，深入了解历史文化
- 国际交流：与来自不同背景的同龄人建立友谊
- 治安：2020年世界正义工程评估显示安全度全球第一
- 城市规划：以"花园城市"著称，绿化优美
- 基础设施：环保意识强，公共设施完善
- 航程：北京直飞仅需5小时
- 交通：公共交通系统发达

data.title_en: 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program
data.title_zh: 2025年夏季日本东京动漫文化探索项目

children.text: The 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program is a 7-day immersive experience designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This program offers a unique opportunity to dive deep into Japan's vibrant anime culture, visit iconic manga museums, interact face-to-face with professional manga artists, and explore top universities like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University. Participants will also enjoy excursions to Tokyo Disneyland and Mount Fuji, creating unforgettable memories while gaining insights into Japan's rich cultural heritage and technological traditions.
2025年夏季日本东京动漫文化探索项目是一个为期7天的沉浸式体验，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，深入探索日本充满活力的动漫文化，参观标志性的漫画博物馆，与职业漫画家面对面交流，并探访东京大学和早稻田大学等顶尖学府。参与者还将畅游迪士尼乐园和富士山，在创造难忘回忆的同时，深入了解日本丰富的文化底蕴与科技传统。

The 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program is a 7-day immersive experience designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This program offers a unique opportunity to dive deep into Japan's vibrant anime culture, visit iconic manga museums, interact face-to-face with professional manga artists, and explore top universities like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University. Participants will also enjoy excursions to Tokyo Disneyland and Mount Fuji, creating unforgettable memories while gaining insights into Japan's rich cultural heritage and technological traditions.
2025年夏季日本东京动漫文化探索项目是一个为期7天的沉浸式体验，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，深入探索日本充满活力的动漫文化，参观标志性的漫画博物馆，与职业漫画家面对面交流，并探访东京大学和早稻田大学等顶尖学府。参与者还将畅游迪士尼乐园和富士山，在创造难忘回忆的同时，深入了解日本丰富的文化底蕴与科技传统。
Explore Japan's anime history and industry through visits to Suginami Animation Museum and Fujiko F. Fujio Museum (Doraemon Museum).
Learn to create your own manga and animation under the guidance of professional manga artists.
Tour prestigious institutions like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University to understand Japan's academic excellence.
Experience Japan's natural beauty at Mount Fuji and cutting-edge technology at the Miraikan (National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation).
Spend a day at Tokyo Disneyland, enjoying its magical attractions and learning financial literacy through fun activities.
动漫文化沉浸：通过参观杉并动画博物馆和藤子·F·不二雄博物馆（哆啦A梦博物馆），探索日本的动漫历史和产业。
动漫创作实践：在专业漫画家的指导下，学习创作自己的漫画和动画。
顶尖大学参访：游览东京大学和早稻田大学等知名学府，了解日本的学术卓越性。
文化与自然探索：在富士山体验日本的自然美景，在日本科学未来馆（Miraikan）感受前沿科技。
迪士尼乐园冒险：在东京迪士尼乐园度过一天，享受其神奇的景点，学习财务管理和创意设计。
Reference Flight: To be confirmed (subject to actual booking)
Gather at the international airport and take an international flight to Narita or Haneda Airport in Tokyo, Japan
Upon arrival, transfer to the hotel by private vehicle for rest
See the Nippon TV Big Clock
Tour Waseda University (special 1-hour student-guided tour included)
Visit the University of Tokyo (special 1-hour student-guided tour included)
Explore the Miraikan (Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation)
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, Hot Spring Dinner
Visit the National Museum of Western Art
Spend the day at Tokyo Disneyland
Meals: Breakfast, Dinner (lunch at your own expense)
Reference Flight: To be confirmed (subject to actual booking)
After breakfast, transfer to the airport by vehicle and take an international flight back to China, concluding a wonderful journey!
第1天: 中国 → 东京
参考航班：待确认（以实际预订为准）
在国际机场集合，搭乘国际航班飞往日本东京成田或羽田机场
抵达后，专车接送至酒店休息
观赏日本电视台大时钟
游览早稻田大学（包含1小时学生特别导览）
参观东京大学（包含1小时学生特别导览）
第4天: 东京 → 富士山
用餐：早餐、午餐、温泉晚餐
全天游览东京迪士尼乐园
用餐：早餐、晚餐（午餐自理）
第7天: 东京 → 中国
参考航班：待确认（以实际预订为准）
早餐后，专车送往机场，搭乘国际航班返回中国，结束美好旅程！

Stay in comfortable 3-star hotels with twin-sharing rooms. Meals: Enjoy authentic Japanese cuisine, including yakitori, tempura, and traditional kaiseki meals. Activities: A mix of educational tours, hands-on workshops, and cultural excursions. Safety: 24/7 supervision by experienced staff, ensuring a safe and supportive environment.​
住宿：入住舒适的三星级酒店，房间为双人间。
餐饮：品尝地道的日本美食，包括日式烤串、天妇罗和传统怀石料理。
活动安排：结合教育参访、实践工作坊和文化探索，内容丰富多样。
安全保障：由经验丰富的工作人员提供24小时监管，确保安全且支持性的环境。

- A world-renowned research university and one of Japan's top institutions. - Part of Japan's 'Super Global University Project' (Type A) to enhance international competitiveness. - Founding member of the Asia-Pacific Association for International Education (APAIE). - Notable Alumni

Seven Japanese prime ministers, nearly one-third of Japan's National Diet members, and founders/CEOs of Sony, Casio, Samsung, Toshiba, Rakuten, Nintendo, Panasonic, and Sanyo. - Cultural Impact: 30 alumni have won the Akutagawa Prize, Japan's highest literary award. - Global Influence: Known for producing graduates with global impact in politics, business, and culture.

A world-renowned research university and one of the most prestigious comprehensive universities globally. - Known as Japan's highest academic institution and the first of the original Imperial Universities. - History: Founded in 1877 as Japan's first national comprehensive university and one of Asia's earliest Western-style universities. - Ranking: Ranked 13th globally and 1st in Japan in the 2016 CWUR World University Rankings. - Achievements: Alumni include Nobel Prize winners, Fields Medalists, Japanese prime ministers, and Speakers of the House of Representatives. - Global Influence: Unmatched influence in Japan and worldwide.
- 世界知名的研究型大学，日本顶尖学府之一。
- 日本'超级国际化大学计划'（A类）成员，旨在提升国际竞争力。
- 亚太国际教育协会（APAIE）的创始成员之一。
- 杰出校友：七位日本前首相，近三分之一的日本国会议员，以及索尼、卡西欧、三星、东芝、乐天、任天堂、松下和三洋的创始人及CEO。
- 文化影响：30位校友获得日本最高文学奖——芥川奖，为日本大学之最。
- 全球影响力：以培养在政治、商业和文化领域具有全球影响力的毕业生而闻名。
- 概述：世界知名的研究型大学，全球最负盛名的综合性大学之一。
- 被誉为日本最高学术机构，也是原七所帝国大学之首。
- 历史：成立于1877年，是日本第一所国立综合性大学，亚洲最早的西式大学之一。
- 排名：在2016年CWUR世界大学排名中位列全球第13位，日本第1位。
- 杰出成就：培养了众多杰出校友，包括诺贝尔奖得主、菲尔兹奖获得者、日本首相和国会众议院议长。
- 全球影响力：在日本及全球范围内具有无可比拟的影响力。

The Singapore Science and Innovation STEM Summer Camp is a 7-day program designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This camp offers a unique opportunity to explore cutting-edge technology through hands-on practice, interactive workshops, and visits to iconic institutions like the Singapore Science Centre and Nanyang Technological University (NTU). Participants will engage in STEM projects, learn about artificial intelligence and environmental sustainability, and experience Singapore's rich cultural heritage while enjoying world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios Singapore.
新加坡科学与创新STEM夏令营是一个为期7天的项目，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该夏令营为学生提供了一个独特的机会，通过动手实践、互动工作坊以及参观新加坡科学馆和南洋理工大学（NTU）等标志性机构，探索新加坡的前沿科技。参与者将参与STEM项目，学习人工智能与环境可持续发展的知识，并体验新加坡丰富的文化遗产，同时还能享受滨海湾花园和新加坡环球影城等世界级景点的乐趣。

The Singapore Science and Innovation STEM Summer Camp is a 7-day program designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This camp offers a unique opportunity to explore cutting-edge technology through hands-on practice, interactive workshops, and visits to iconic institutions like the Singapore Science Centre and Nanyang Technological University (NTU). Participants will engage in STEM projects, learn about artificial intelligence and environmental sustainability, and experience Singapore's rich cultural heritage while enjoying world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios Singapore.
新加坡科学与创新STEM夏令营是一个为期7天的项目，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该夏令营为学生提供了一个独特的机会，通过动手实践、互动工作坊以及参观新加坡科学馆和南洋理工大学（NTU）等标志性机构，探索新加坡的前沿科技。参与者将参与STEM项目，学习人工智能与环境可持续发展的知识，并体验新加坡丰富的文化遗产，同时还能享受滨海湾花园和新加坡环球影城等世界级景点的乐趣。
Courses and workshops at top Singaporean institutions like Nanyang Technological University and the Science Centre Singapore.
Visit iconic sites such as Merlion Park, Gardens by the Bay, and Jewel Changi Airport.
Participate in environmental demonstrations and STEM courses with practical applications.
Engage in group work and team-building exercises to foster collaboration and friendship.
Learn from experienced educators and industry professionals to gain insights into the future of STEM and AI.
• AI与STEM重点：在新加坡南洋理工大学和科学中心等顶级机构进行课程和工作坊。
• 文化探索：参观鱼尾狮公园、滨海花园和樟宜机场等标志性景点。
• 实践学习：参与环保演示和具有实际应用的STEM课程。
• 社交活动：参与小组作业和团队建设练习，促进合作与友谊。
• 专家指导：向经验丰富的教育工作者和行业专业人士学习，深入了解STEM和AI的未来。

data.title_zh: 2025年新加坡南洋理工大学AI探索项目

children.text: We warmly invite outstanding high school students passionate about artificial intelligence to join us in exploring the mysteries of AI and its impact on the future of society. From January 20 to January 24, 2025, participants will engage in a 5-day AI Exploration Program at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore. By learning cutting-edge AI technologies such as ChatGPT, students will gain a global perspective and insights into the latest advancements in the field. This program offers a unique opportunity to experience life at a world-leading university while developing critical skills for the future.
诚邀对人工智能充满热情的优秀高中生加入，共同探索AI领域的奥秘及其对未来社会的影响。2025年1月20日至1月24日，参与者将在新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU）参加为期5天的AI探索项目。通过学习ChatGPT等前沿AI技术，学生将获得全球视野，了解该领域的最新进展。此项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，体验世界顶尖大学的学习生活，同时培养未来所需的关键技能。

We warmly invite outstanding high school students passionate about artificial intelligence to join us in exploring the mysteries of AI and its impact on the future of society. From January 20 to January 24, 2025, participants will engage in a 5-day AI Exploration Program at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore. By learning cutting-edge AI technologies such as ChatGPT, students will gain a global perspective and insights into the latest advancements in the field. This program offers a unique opportunity to experience life at a world-leading university while developing critical skills for the future.
诚邀对人工智能充满热情的优秀高中生加入，共同探索AI领域的奥秘及其对未来社会的影响。2025年1月20日至1月24日，参与者将在新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU）参加为期5天的AI探索项目。通过学习ChatGPT等前沿AI技术，学生将获得全球视野，了解该领域的最新进展。此项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，体验世界顶尖大学的学习生活，同时培养未来所需的关键技能。
Taught by NTU's distinguished faculty on campus, ensuring high-quality educational content

Covers global awareness and cultural experiences, enhancing overall personal development
Professional support from experts to assist with future university applications

The Epsom College International Summer Camp offers students aged 12-17 a unique opportunity to experience elite British education in a prestigious boarding school environment. This program combines intensive English language learning with a wide range of academic subjects and extracurricular activities. Located on Epsom College's beautiful 84-acre campus just 15 miles from London, students benefit from world-class facilities while exploring British culture through organized excursions to London, Oxford, and other historic sites. With expert teaching from qualified staff, 24-hour supervision, and comprehensive boarding facilities, this summer camp provides the perfect balance of academic enrichment, cultural immersion, and recreational activities.

爱普森学院国际夏令营为12-17岁的学生提供了在一个享有盛誉的英国寄宿学校环境中体验精英英国教育的独特机会。该项目将密集的英语语言学习与广泛的学术科目和课外活动相结合。爱普森学院美丽的84英亩校园位于距离伦敦仅15英里的地方，学生可以使用世界一流的设施，同时通过组织前往伦敦、牛津和其他历史遗址的远足来探索英国文化。在合格教师的专业教学、24小时监督和全面的寄宿设施下，这个夏令营提供了学术丰富、文化沉浸和娱乐活动的完美平衡。

Experience the best of British education in a leading English-speaking country renowned for its world-class academic resources.
Stay and dine at Epsom College, a historic institution with a legacy of academic excellence and a nurturing environment.
Small class sizes (under 20 students) with British Council-certified teachers, ensuring personalized attention and active participation.
Interact with students from diverse backgrounds, fostering international friendships and cultural confidence.
Explore London, Oxford, and Cambridge, with expert-guided tours of iconic sites like the British Museum and National Gallery.
Secure campus with 24/7 supervision, ensuring a safe and supportive environment for all participants.
• 顶级英国目的地：在这个以世界一流学术资源闻名的英语国家，体验最优质的英式教育。
• 精英学校体验：在埃普森学院（Epsom College）住宿和用餐，这是一所历史悠久、学术卓越并充满关怀环境的学府。
• 语言沉浸：小班教学（每班少于20名学生），由英国文化协会认证的教师授课，确保个性化关注和积极参与。
• 全球社区：与来自不同背景的学生互动，培养国际友谊和文化自信。
• 文化游览：探索伦敦、牛津和剑桥，由专家带领参观大英博物馆和国家美术馆等标志性景点。
• 安全与舒适：校园安全，提供24/7全天候监管，确保所有参与者的安全和支持性环境。

The "Path to Ivy League" Summer Program at CATS Academy Boston is a 15-day immersive experience designed for students aged 14 to 18 who are aiming to prepare for top-tier universities, particularly Ivy League institutions. Located in the academic hub of Boston, this program offers a unique blend of rigorous academic preparation, cultural exploration, and personal growth. Participants will engage in TOEFL and SAT training, attend university application workshops, and visit prestigious institutions like Harvard and MIT, all while experiencing life at a top American boarding school.​
CATS Academy Boston 的“常春藤之路”暑期项目是一个为期 15 天的沉浸式体验，专为 14 至 18 岁、有志于申请顶尖大学（尤其是常春藤盟校）的学生设计。该项目位于学术中心波士顿，独特地融合了严格的学术准备、文化探索和个人成长。参与者将参加 TOEFL 和 SAT 培训、大学申请研讨会，并参观哈佛大学和麻省理工学院等著名学府，同时体验顶尖美国寄宿学校的生活。

The "Path to Ivy League" Summer Program at CATS Academy Boston is a 15-day immersive experience designed for students aged 14 to 18 who are aiming to prepare for top-tier universities, particularly Ivy League institutions. Located in the academic hub of Boston, this program offers a unique blend of rigorous academic preparation, cultural exploration, and personal growth. Participants will engage in TOEFL and SAT training, attend university application workshops, and visit prestigious institutions like Harvard and MIT, all while experiencing life at a top American boarding school.​
CATS Academy Boston 的“常春藤之路”暑期项目是一个为期 15 天的沉浸式体验，专为 14 至 18 岁、有志于申请顶尖大学（尤其是常春藤盟校）的学生设计。该项目位于学术中心波士顿，独特地融合了严格的学术准备、文化探索和个人成长。参与者将参加 TOEFL 和 SAT 培训、大学申请研讨会，并参观哈佛大学和麻省理工学院等著名学府，同时体验顶尖美国寄宿学校的生活。
Intensive TOEFL and SAT training, along with personalized college application guidance.
Stay and study at CATS Academy Boston, a leading international boarding school with a proven track record of sending students to Ivy League universities.
Visit Harvard University, MIT, and other top institutions to gain insights into campus life and academic excellence.
Participate in themed parties, city explorations, and team-building activities to foster cross-cultural friendships.
Learn from experienced teachers and university admissions counselors who provide hands-on support for college applications.
• 常春藤名校预备: 密集的托福 (TOEFL) 和 SAT 培训，以及个性化的大学申请指导。
• 顶尖高中体验: 入住并学习于 CATS Academy Boston —— 一所领先的国际寄宿学校，拥有将学生送入常春藤盟校的卓越记录。
• 大学参访: 参观哈佛大学、麻省理工学院 (MIT) 和其他顶尖学府，深入了解校园生活和卓越学术。
• 文化社交活动: 参加主题派对、城市探索和团队建设活动，培养跨文化友谊。
• 专家指导: 向经验丰富的教师和大学招生顾问学习，获得大学申请的实践支持。

Single rooms with private bathrooms, ensuring comfort and privacy. Meals: Enjoy American-style buffet meals on campus and packed meals during excursions. Activities: A mix of academic classes, university tours, and fun social events like disco parties, movie nights, and cultural showcases. Safety: Fully supervised program with 24/7 support from staff. Cultural Immersion: Expert-guided tours of iconic sites provide deep insights into American culture and academic life.​
住宿： 单人间，带独立卫浴，确保舒适和隐私。
膳食： 在校内享用美式自助餐，外出游览期间提供盒装餐食。
活动： 结合学术课程、大学参观和有趣的社交活动，如迪斯科派对、电影之夜和文化展示。
安全： 全程监督的项目，工作人员提供 24/7 全天候支持。
文化沉浸： 由专家带领参观标志性地点，深入了解美国文化和学术生活。

Gain essential strategies and techniques to excel in TOEFL and SAT exams, setting you apart from other applicants.​Enhanced English Proficiency: Improve your English language skills to compete effectively with native applicants for top U.S. universities.​Optimized Application Materials: Learn how to craft compelling resumes and essays highlighting your strengths and potential.​
TOEFL 和 SAT 策略： 掌握 TOEFL 和 SAT 考试中脱颖而出的基本策略和技巧。
提升英语水平： 提高英语语言技能，以便与母语申请者有效竞争美国顶尖大学。
优化申请材料： 学习如何撰写引人注目的简历和文书，突出你的优势和潜力。
